previous.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 40 days in a row, down 57% from their peak on Jan 6. Now back below the April/July highs.🙏 https://t.co/OOKO6calcJ

localize.full_text: 美国Covid-19住院人数已连续40天下降，较1月6日的峰值下降57%。现在又回到了4-7月的高点以下。🙏 https://t.co/OOKO6calcJ

next.excerpt: Decentraland is a decentralized virtual reality platform powered by the Ethereum blockchain. Within the Decentraland platform, users can create, experience, and monetize their content and applications.
next.title: Decentraland 2.0 - Explore a virtual world owned by its users

localize.description: Decentraland是一个由Ethereum区块链驱动的去中心化虚拟现实平台。在Decentraland平台内，用户可以创建、体验和货币化他们的内容和应用。
localize.tagline: 探索一个属于用户的虚拟世界

localize.description: Decentraland是一個由Ethereum區塊鏈驅動的去中心化虛擬現實平臺。在Decentraland平臺內，用戶可以創建、體驗和貨幣化他們的內容和應用。
localize.tagline: 探索一個屬於用戶的虛擬世界
